label: 華夷
本: State and Diplomacy in Early Modern Japan: Asia in the Development of the Tokugawa Bakufu . Stanford University Press . 1991
説明文: A Chinese model of interstate relations and self-perception, centered around the dichotomy which made distinctions between inner" [ka, or "civlized"] and "outer" [i, or "barbarian"]. [Also see ka (華）and i（夷）]."
